subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Carlos Beltran put on a rare display of might for a lineup that was missing Ike Davis and David Wright, swatting three home runs, a career high, to lead the Mets over the Rockies.
snippet: Carlos Beltran put on a rare display of might for a lineup that was missing Ike Davis and David Wright, swatting three home runs, a career high, to lead the Mets over the Rockies.
